The '''Legacy Skin Pack''' is a skin pack on ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' consisting of 22 skins that were previously part of skin packs on [[Legacy Console Edition]]. It includes all skins from the [[Default Skin Pack (Legacy Console Edition)|Default Skin Pack]] except Athlete Steve and Athlete Alex. At some point, this skin pack was delisted.
